channel.title: How to do donations [508]
channel.description:
I see on a lot of forums that when you donate they post a ID number of there purchase. Then they get the item. How does this work? How do I do this so it automatically does this for me?
Also another way I see is that the person donates then when they log in they have there items almost instantly. How can I do that (this is the way i really want to do it) This is with a 508 IDK if that matters I don't know how to do it with a 317 or anything so please tell me how to do this.

item.title: How to do donations [508]
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

Thanks for the input do you guys know any kind of way to do this I am using *

Read full topic

item.title: How to do donations [508]
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

They usually have it integrated with vBulletin or similar automatic payment software, so when you donate, you are moved to a certain group. On login, the server checks if you are in that group, and if you are, it will check if you received your items yet. If not, it will give you your items, then it will change the int from 0 to 1 so you can’t receive them again.

If it’s an ID, then it’s just a paypal ID for the owner to verify the payment and confirm it manually.

Read full topic

item.title: How to do donations [508]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I believe the ID they post on the servers site is the transition ID from paypal, nothing more. This allows the server owner to lookup the payment amount in his paypal easier. As for actually making the server do it automatically, I’ve not actually seen a server do it with Paypal but I believe there is one for oneBip if you Google it.

Read full topic
